tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.command:
@PREPARE_INPUT_FILE@ #set $section = $sec_required.reference_source @PREPARE_FASTA_REF@
#set $section = $sec_restrict @PREPARE_TARGETS_FILE@ @PREPARE_REGIONS_FILE@
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## csq required inputs section #set $section = $sec_required.reference_source @FASTA_REF@ --gff-annot '$sec_required.gff_annot'
## csq options section #if str($sec_csq_opts.ncsq): --ncsq $sec_csq_opts.ncsq #end if $sec_csq_opts.local_csq #if $sec_csq_opts.phase: --phase $sec_csq_opts.phase #end if #if str($sec_csq_opts.custom_tag): --custom-tag '$sec_csq_opts.custom_tag' #end if #if str($sec_csq_opts.trim_protein_seq) --trim-protein-seq $sec_csq_opts.trim_protein_seq #end if #if $sec_csq_opts.genetic_code --genetic-code '$sec_csq_opts.genetic_code' #end if
## Subset section #set $section = $sec_subset @SAMPLES@
## Filter section #set $section = $sec_restrict @INCLUDE@ @EXCLUDE@ @REGIONS@ @TARGETS@
@OUTPUT_TYPE@
## Primary Input/Outputs @INPUT_FILE@ > '$output_file'

param.name: ncsq
param.label: maximum number of consequences to consider per site

param.name: local_csq
param.label: run localized predictions considering only one VCF record at a time
param.help: --local-csq switch off haplotype-aware calling, run localized predictions considering only one VCF record at a time

param.name: phase
param.label: phase
param.help: how to construct haplotypes and how to deal with unphased data
param.option: take GTs as is, create haplotypes regardless of phase (0/1 -> 0|1)
merge *all* GTs into a single haplotype (0/1 -> 1, 1/2 -> 1)
require phased GTs, throw an error on unphased het GTs

param.name: custom_tag
param.label: use this custom tag to store consequences rather than the default BCSQ tag
Abbreviate protein-changing predictions
param.help: Abbreviate protein-changing predictions to max INT aminoacids

param.label: Genetic code table
param.help: Choose a predefined genetic code table used to translate coding sequences. Leave unset for the default bcftools behaviour.
param.option: 4: Mold, Protozoan, Coelenterate mitochondrial; Mycoplasma; Spiroplasma
